passive.name: GARDEN OF THORNS
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) GARDEN OF THORNS
                                A Thorn Spitter with 20 Health (20 + 25% ) sprouts when Grasping Roots first hits an enemy champion. If no enemy champion is hit, a Thorn Spitter will sprout when Grasping Roots ends.Thorn Spitters automatically attack targets within 6 second(s) of sprouting, dealing 10-80 magic damage (10-80 () + 13% ).An additional Thorn Spitter sprouts with every enemy champion, large monster, or epic monster Deadly Spines hits.Deals 50% of damage to monsters.Thorn Spitters spawned after the first deal 50% of damage to the same target.Enemy champions’ abilities deal 40% damage to Thorn Spitters.

q.name: (Q) DEADLY SPINES
q.description:
(Q) DEADLY SPINES
 7/6.5/6/5.5s   75 
                                
                                
                                Vines spread and burst into spines, dealing 70 magic damage (70/125/180/235 + 60% ) and sprouting 1 Thorn Spitter(s).

w.name: (W) RAMPANT GROWTH
w.description:
(W) RAMPANT GROWTH
 15/14/13/12s   50 
                                
                                
                                Plants a seed that lasts 6 second(s) on an enemy (excluding minions), dealing 5
magic damage (5/8/11/14 + 3.5% ) every 0.5 second(s) and slowing them by 15/20/25/30% for 3 second(s). Thorn Spitters deal bonus damage to targets that carry seeds.

e.name: (E) GRASPING ROOTS
e.description:
(E) GRASPING ROOTS
 12s   60 
                                
                                
                                Zyra sends binding vines forward, rooting enemies hit for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75 second(s), and dealing 60 magic damage (60/100/140/180 + 40% ).A Thorn Spitter spawns when the ability first hits an enemy champion or when it ends. (Large and epic monsters are also considered as champions.)

r.name: (R) STRANGLETHORNS
r.description:
(R) STRANGLETHORNS
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Zyra summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket that deals 170 magic damage (170/250/330 + 60% ) to enemies. After 2 second(s), the vines snap upwards, knocking up enemies for 1 second(s). The Thorn Spitters within the thicket become enraged, resetting their duration and gaining 50% bonus Health and 50% bonus Attack Speed.
notes: duration and gaining 50% bonus Health and 50% bonus Attack Speed

starting_items_detailed.passive: Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 50% health. Killing a minion heals the nearest allied champion for 50 health and grants them kill gold. 3 charges; recharges every 35 seconds.
starting_items_detailed.description: Starting support item for tanky supports. Provides sustain and gold generation for both you and your ADC.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 50% health. Killing a minion heals the nearest allied champion for 50 health and grants them kill gold.
situational_items_detailed.active: Ward: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 150 seconds (4 charges, refills upon visiting shop)
situational_items_detailed.description: Upgraded support item that provides health, sustain, and vision control. Essential for tanky supports.

example_build_detailed.name: Crown Of The Shattered Queen
example_build_detailed.description: Details for Crown Of The Shattered Queen

example_build_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
example_build_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.
